author: max
name: NoSpoiler
install_msg:
Thanks for installing.
This cog relies on red's autoimmune, to ignore role(s) or user(s) use `[p]autoimmune` from red. You are not immune from any spoiler filter without setting up autoimmune.
<https://github.com/ltzmax/maxcogs/tree/master/nospoiler/README.md> for documentation.
description: Prevent spoilers in this server by deleting messages with spoiler tags or attachments.
short: Prevent spoilers in this server by deleting messages with spoiler tags or attachments.
end_user_data_statement: This cog does not store any End User Data.
